website_summaries.verdict: Kids have a hard time keeping their hands off these birds that tweet, talk back, and sing to them.
pros: Birds respond with a tweet or a song when you pet them and in response to your voice
Your child can record a message and bird says it back
Can be purchased with or without the cage
Comes in several colors and styles
cons: The bird can be a little temperamental and can stop working if dropped
Cage is designed more for looks than protection – bird can fall out

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: Opened the gift Saturday, my daughter loved it as a birthday gift however now that the batteries ran out Tuesday I replaced the batteries and the lights and beak move but the sound isn't working! Didn't last a week :( Bummed UPDATE: I called Amazon and they are sending me a free replacement, I sure hope this next one works better! :)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun light up toy with voice recording
customer_reviews.text: This toy was shipped in a protective bag/box combo (but no other packing)... it seems to have made it fine (see pic). It looks just like the ad, and the battery was good, at least has been for a few tries. The lights are beautiful and cycle through a couple colors; your recorded message plays back filtered to "chipmunk" and sounds tinny, but it does repeat and then add some tweets that are nice, clear tones. I do see lots of tie wraps, so I'll warn my family to open it gently since others say the cage is delicate. It should make a nice present for my granddaughter.
customer_reviews.author: Chris D. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: I really like this toy. It came exactly as I expected from the description given, and my daughter loves it. My favorite feature is that it records things my daughter says and repeats it back. It's not annoying though so a win for all.
customer_reviews.author: Meagan Ververa

customer_reviews.title: Thank you!
customer_reviews.text: Bird was dead when it got here. Couldnt open it till christmas to fix it. We did have to try a couple new batteries but it finally started working. Thank goodness! My daughter loves it. Shipping was fast too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Probably the best present I bought my daughter. Everything else got forgotten about, but she has consistently played with her bird. She is a big animal lover though!
customer_reviews.author: GalVeg

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Toy for Your Little Girl 🎀
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy~ my daughter keeps coming back to it now & again. She likes “flying” it outside and having it sing to her other animal toys. Also: it’s pretty, not nearly as annoying as other recording toys can be, & the batteries in it last awhile. 👍🏼
customer_reviews.author: Limesmile19dance

customer_reviews.title: I am Mordo,
customer_reviews.text: I have two children and both absolutely love this! They really enjoy coming up with silly things for the bird to say.
customer_reviews.author: Sea

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: I checked with my granddaughter and she has the bird cage hanging from the ceiling above her bed. If she likes it, then I like it!
customer_reviews.author: Donna WhitcombFisher Associates

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a great bird that talks back on silly voice. Has nice tunes. It's a hit with my boys! Must buy:)
customer_reviews.author: Cristina

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter loves it so much! She especially loves that the bird repeats what she says. She laughs and laughs!
customer_reviews.author: alliesstar2

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my niece for Christmas. She loved it and it's actually still working almost a year later with pretty rough play
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Labrada

customer_reviews.title: Cute bird, but voice box stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8-year old daughter. She loves it, however the voice box stopped working, so it’s a bit disappointing. It lights up and the beak moves, but it doesn’t make any sound. I changed the batteries hoping that might fix it, but it still doesn’t work. It sounds like other reviewers have had the same issue. Overall, it’s a cute gift, but the quality is poor and it won’t last long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute toy
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a christmas gift and my 4yr old loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Lane

customer_reviews.title: Fun Fun
customer_reviews.text: Gave as a Christmas gift. Big hit. Very interactive fun for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: She loved it
customer_reviews.text: Was a requested gift for a 6 year old girl. She was very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: farine

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 5yr old who absolutely loves it! It is very easy to operate and my 2yr old also loves playing with it!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Gave as gifts, fun and interactive toy! Kids love them!
customer_reviews.author: Marian S

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift
customer_reviews.text: The sounds are amazing on this toy bird and color are cool
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this. Great gift from Christmas and it holds up well such a cute toy.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave for Christmas for my daugther she loves this alot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy it you'll like it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome toy so cute and good sturdy durable toy also.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki

customer_reviews.title: Sooo cute,
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4yr old granddaughter for this past Christmas. It’s sooo cute & she loved it. My only issue was it could have been a little sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality !
customer_reviews.text: Just like buying it off the shelf at the store. Great quality product and worked perfectly. It was a great birthday gift ! No damages to the packaging or product
customer_reviews.author: Nina love

customer_reviews.title: Fun for a 6 year old!
customer_reviews.text: It is fun to use. After you play with it a lot it can run out of battery, but you can replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Sandeep Goel

customer_reviews.title: Good product...didnt use mych.
customer_reviews.text: Works fine. My 4 year old lost interest in about a week.
customer_reviews.author: WellDunn

customer_reviews.title: Wrong color received
customer_reviews.text: Right product, wrong style. I chose the blue bird for my nephew and got the purple. No complaint otherwise.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Tiffee

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves it !
customer_reviews.text: Such a great toy, she loves that it copies what she says and lights up when you pet him. The only reason I gave four stars is because I paid for rush delivery so it would arrive in time for her birthday and it was two days late.
customer_reviews.author: Alisa K Freda

product_meta.title: Little Live Pets Bird with Cage-Twinkle Tweets Childrens Toy
product_meta.description:
Little Live Pets Light Up Birds have brilliant light-up wings and love to show off their glow. They repeat what you say and sing sweet songs, with their glorious wings lighting up to their tunes! These birds love to be pet, the more they're pet, the more they'll tweet and sing. This bird loves to swing and shine inside their beautiful birdcage home. As they tweet and sing, their wings will brighten up both your day and night! Take them with you in their cage wherever you go. • Skye Twinkle's rainbow wings sparkle and glow like the stars in the night sky! WARNING: Choking hazard - Small parts. Not for children under 3 years WARNING: Requires 2 x AAA/LR03 Batteries. Hazardous if swallowed - See instructions (Batteries not included).

SET CONTAINS:
1 x Light Up Bird 1 x Bird Cage 1 x Instruction Manual 2 x AAA/LR03 Batteries
feature_bullets: My wings light up as I sing or tweet!
Take your light-up bird with you in its lantern bird cage!
I record your voice and say it back!
The more you pet, the more I sing!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars149 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
